en.TUTORIAL_MSG_1:
WELCOME TO FOOTCHINKO!
I'M HERE TO NARRATE YOUR EPIC
PROGRESSION IN ALL THE 94
MATCHES OF THIS GAME
en.TUTORIAL_MSG_2:
HERE BELOW IS THE TROPHY CASE,
WITH ALL MAJOR INTERNATIONAL
FOOTBALL TOURNAMENTS
BUT HEY! YOU NEED TO WIN
THESE TROPHIES FIRST
en.TUTORIAL_MSG_3:
LET'S START WITH THE OCEANIA CUP
YES! THEY PLAY FOOTBALL TOO!
CHOOSE YOUR TEAM
AND START PLAYING
ADVICES: DID YOU KNOW THAT YOU CAN BUY ITEMS AT THE SHOP? THEY MIGHT HELP YOU SCORE!
HAVE YOU CONSIDERED GETTING THREE EXTRA BALLS IN THE SHOP TO WIN THE NEXT MATCH?
THE BALL OF FIRE WILL CLEAR SOME OF THE OBSTACLES IN YOUR WAY...
YOU CAN GET RID OF ALL THOSE STUBBORN RIVALS BY USING THE VOODOO DOLL ON THEM.
IF THE GOALKEEPER IS ANNOYING YOU... WHY ABOUT FREEZING HIM?
EACH EXTRA GOAL YOU SCORE WILL GIVE YOU MORE COINS.
YOU CAN CHECK YOUR GAME STATS AT THE TITLE SCREEN.
BE READY FOR EXTRA TIME LEVELS. TIME IS MONEY!
SAVE UP YOUR MONEY FOR THE TOUGH MATCHES. YOU MAY NEED HELP AT SOME POINT.
DON'T MISS THE STREAKER, HIS BALLS CAN SAVE THE MATCH!
